title: Mbaa naipirita koronapairas
licenseNotes: Do not change the text of this work, but you may translate it, adapt it into other forms, and distribute it for non-commercial purposes. You must keep the copyrights and credits for the author and illustrator Weiman Kou.
credits: Created by Weiman Kow, instagram: weimankow
summary: This book gives basic advice on dealing with the coronavirus COVID 19

11.saq: Keatae ntoki nabo ake neyiere niyelou neiko Koronapairas

19.saq: Kerasaa ana pairas tanaa kore kullo ldarat

20.saq: Talama: kore tinilamari riot are naaku mikibaki naa lolo darat.

24.saq: Naaku tinidol ltung’ani egira allwa/ nesing’/omwai indim nigelu aas:

25.saq: Nchoo nanka napuyiapui. Keidim nolwuaki ankata esing’aki nia anka neirita lkule enyikita ninye.

29.saq: Keidim aikata naaku momwai, koon ake eripito.

30.saq: Kore ltung’ana etarasutua keidim neitarasaa abaki tanaa melio ajo komoyia ninche.

31.saq: Kore te nkidapash, keisupat piilam ltururi amu miyiolo naa aikata ajo ng’ae omwai.

35.saq: ng’oji naironyi te ntoki nailiepeki nkurupani

39.saq: ankata siake oriong enia anka napuyiapui enkutuk

45.saq: Kake kore aikata keidim nkamulak eltung’ani omwai nodoki ntokitin...

49.saq: Naa kore tinishomo niimbong’ kunna tokitin aikata imiyiolo, nintoki aibung’ nkomom ino,

50.saq: naa kore ake nkoitei nanere puworinye koon naa tununtukoo te saiboni.

51.saq: Keidim ale kukuu nowuon tee ntokitin tenkata naado

58.saq: Mimbung’ nkomoom ino (tanaa nkomoom elikae). Kore tanaa iyeu nimbung’, ntuko angas nkaik te saiboni katukul.

59.saq: Nkata naitosha piirany “mpari eunoto eng’ida” nkatitin are.

65.saq: tenaaku aikata imbung’a, muure. Ntuko ake adake nkaik inono te saiboni.

66.saq: Kore atoki, tanaa keidimai, miimbung’ oriong enia aanka ninchopito te nkutuk.

68.saq: Kobulu naa ale kukuu taatua nia anka tininchop nkata naado.

69.saq: Nturai nia kitambaa enkutuk tenejing lchapu. Minterepaa mpari inchopito!

75.saq: Eming’ar ndaa, mpilipili, lkoombeni anaa sii taulo.

76.saq: Meata nunko tiniseyie nkomoom ino te laideloki abaki tinitasaana.

77.saq: tanaa keidimai, tobolie tanaa nkenie milangoni laideloki tanaa sipi aaku mara nkaik.

81.saq: Ntuko nkaik inono te saiboni nkata pooki.

87.saq: Read the articles for more tips!

88.saq: “This animation shows how far your sneeze can actually travel” by Chia Yi Hou and Andrea Schmitz, in Business Insider (Jan 21, 2020)

92.saq: For all other uses, please send a request in to: comicsforgood@gmail.com

107.en: Created by Weiman Kow, instagram: weimankow
